roleset.name: give a summary of information
roleset.note: BRIEF-V NOTES: Frames file for 'brief' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from brief.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: all args
example.text: Eventually, [Mr. Stoll]-1 was invited *trace* to both the CIA and NSA *trace*-1 to brief high-ranking officers on computer theft.

example.name: lacking topic
example.text: And [he]-3 plans *trace*-3 to brief the president at the end of the week, U.S. sources said.
example.arg: at the end of the week

example.name: lacking agent too
example.text: Administration officials say [President Bush]-1 was briefed *trace*-1 throughout Friday afternoon and evening, even after leaving for Camp David.
example.arg: even after leaving for Camp David
